---
category: news
title: "An approach using ddRADseq and machine learning for understanding speciation in Antarctic Antarctophilinidae gastropods"
excerpt: "Sampling impediments and paucity of suitable material for molecular analyses have precluded the study of speciation and radiation of deep-sea species in Antarctica. We analyzed barcodes together with genome-wide single nucleotide polymorphisms obtained from double digestion restriction site-associated DNA sequencing (ddRADseq) for species in the family Antarctophilinidae."
publishedDateTime: 2021-04-19T00:00:00Z
